amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being provided to contractors unless the contractors are in compliance with existing law regarding hiring preferences for veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to be expended to enter into or renew a contract with any business entity that cannot verify that it is in compliance with existing law regarding hiring preferences for veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
